summary: Completed comprehensive responsive design testing for molecular visualization dashboard. Verified desktop layout, mobile layout, hamburger menu functionality, panel stacking, and molecule generation on mobile devices.

ui_bugs.issue: Backdrop click to close sidebar has pointer event interception - timeout when clicking backdrop
ui_bugs.details: Element intercepts pointer events preventing backdrop click to close functionality

passed_tests: Desktop layout - sidebar visible and split view working
Mobile layout - hamburger menu visible, sidebar hidden
Panel stacking on mobile (h-[50vh] class applied)
Hamburger menu opens mobile sidebar overlay
Mobile sidebar overlay appears with backdrop
Close button (X) present in mobile sidebar
Responsive text sizing (85 small text elements, 11 responsive classes)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix backdrop click functionality in mobile sidebar - there's an element intercepting pointer events that prevents closing the sidebar by clicking the backdrop. The close button (X) works but backdrop click times out.
